title: Meditation empowered by blockchain
description: Existing meditation apps are centralized and based on a suboptimal paywall model. Teachers need a better way to monetize their content.
solution: Dyana : a Dapp where meditation content creators can enter the WEB 3.0 economy, using Nft's, pooling mechanisms and open governance.
experience: Over 20 years of experience within the wellness industry, including 10 years running a digital studio and app based products.
